last_episode_to_air.name: Episode 12
last_episode_to_air.overview: The killer started the last move, to kill the rest and escape from this island. A group of survivors is trapped in a trap. They had to struggle to get out of this blood-soaked island. In the end, who will escape from this abyss!?

name: Remember 15
overview:
A mystery message from "Lyla", a school queen who committed suicide five years ago. It was sent to a former high school classmate, her senior, and her sister. Everyone was wondering how this message was sent. Since Lyla had died a long time ago…..

So the 12 of them returned to a deserted island. This is the place where Lyla died five years ago… to pay tribute to Lyla and find out who actually sent the message to prank….

But the closer it gets to the truth, the more they discover their cruel past. The dark secrets of the people they call "friends" until this deserted island…. has become a bloody arena…

seasons.name: Season 1
seasons.overview:
A mystery message from "Lyla", a school star who committed suicide five years ago, was sent to her former high school classmate, seniors, and her sister. Everyone was wondering how this message was able to be sent, since Lyla had died a long time ago….

The 12 of them returned to the deserted island, the place where Lyla died five years ago… to pay tribute to Lyla and find out the truth about who sent the message to be a joke….

But the closer it gets to the truth the more they discover their cruel past. The dark secrets of the people they call “friends” have made this desert island become a bloody arena….

tagline: “I miss everyone…. Shall we meet again on that island?”

episodes.name: Episode 1
episodes.overview: A mystery message from Lyla, a girl who committed suicide on a deserted island five years ago was sent to her friends, seniors and juniors. The 12 of them returned to a deserted island to pay tribute to Lyla ... And find out about who actually sent this prank message …. But what they encounter is a tragedy that will change their lives forever.

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.overview: After an unexpected tragedy, they were trying to figure out who was planning them to come to this deserted island…. But the more they search, the more they learn the secrets from the past. The secret of the people they call friends…. Plus, one of them was an assassin who assassinated them with an unpredictable purpose.

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.overview: After an unexpected event Dan no longer trusts his best friend Bill, Plato and Ken try to figure out who planned the whole thing. A group of close friends began to distrust each other, until it leads to another bloody event

episodes.name: Episode 4
episodes.overview: Plato, Ken, Gel, and Fone decide to leave the group. But there is a reason to make Sonar, Nest, and Mind secretly follows the four…. After group separation, all friendship shatters. Bill and Bozo decide to do whatever it takes to survive.

episodes.name: Episode 5
episodes.overview: Sonar and Nest decide to team up with the people they've always hated, Bew and Bozo hunt down for the person they suspected of planning the whole thing… These events set this deserted island on fire.

episodes.name: Episode 6
episodes.overview: Once again, the situation was nearing the point of bloodshed… The secrets of the past began to be revealed until they didn't know whom else to believe… The killer then made a major move to make the island soak in blood.

episodes.name: Episode 7
episodes.overview: The bloodshed caused them to no longer trust anyone. Sonar learns the secret of Nest that is unforgivable. While the truth is revealed… someone, that no one expected, appeared!

episodes.name: Episode 8
episodes.overview: The survivors became aware of the sins they committed five years ago.  Meanwhile the person they thought was dead, instead, appeared in front of them with a terrifying purpose and plan! And they realized that the one who planned this was not the only one!

episodes.name: Episode 9
episodes.overview: The killer began to make a major move. While the survivors decide to cooperate to find a way out of this island, Sonar's dark secrets are revealed, leading to a shocking story in the past.

episodes.name: Episode 10
episodes.overview: Five years ago, after a secret video clip of Lyla was released by someone, Lyla's life was never the same again. So she decided to make a big plan to find out who destroyed her life!

episodes.name: Episode 11
episodes.overview: 12 of them went to a deserted island for the first time, to talk openly, to forgive for the hatred of each other. Leila begged everyone so she could go along, with the savage plan she had prepared to punish everyone. It leads to a tragedy they will never forget in their lifetimes.

episodes.name: Episode 12
episodes.overview: The killer started the last move, to kill the rest and escape from this island. A group of survivors is trapped in a trap. They had to struggle to get out of this blood-soaked island. In the end, who will escape from this abyss!?

1.name: Season 1
1.overview:
A mystery message from "Lyla", a school star who committed suicide five years ago, was sent to her former high school classmate, seniors, and her sister. Everyone was wondering how this message was able to be sent, since Lyla had died a long time ago….

The 12 of them returned to the deserted island, the place where Lyla died five years ago… to pay tribute to Lyla and find out the truth about who sent the message to be a joke….

But the closer it gets to the truth the more they discover their cruel past. The dark secrets of the people they call “friends” have made this desert island become a bloody arena….
